io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.service.api.rest

Interface OffermanagementRestService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RestService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffermanagementRestServiceImpl

    @Path(value="/offermanagement/v1")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public interface OffermanagementRestService
extends RestService
    This class contains methods for REST calls. Some URI structures may seem deprecated, but in fact are not. See the correspondent comments on top.

      • getOffer

        @GET
 @Path(value="/offer/{id}")
OfferEto getOffer(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                     long id)
        Delegates to Offermanagement.findOffer(java.lang.Long).
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the OfferEto
        Returns:
        the OfferEto

 @Path(value="/offer/")

      • isProductInUseByOffer

        @GET
 @Path(value="/product/{id}/inuse")
boolean isProductInUseByOffer(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                         long id)
        Delegates to Offermanagement.isProductInUseByOffer(io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.to.ProductEto).
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the ProductEto
        Returns:
        true, if there are no offers, that use the given ProductEto. false otherwise.

      • getFilteredOffers

        @GET
 @Path(value="/sortby/{sortBy}")
 @Deprecated
List<OfferEto> getFilteredOffers(OfferFilter offerFilter,
                                                                                       @PathParam(value="sortBy")
                                                                                       OfferSortBy sortBy)
        Deprecated. 
        Delegates to Offermanagement.findOffersFiltered(io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.to.OfferFilter, io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.to.OfferSortBy).
        Parameters:
        offerFilter - the offers filter criteria
        sortBy - sorting specification
        Returns:
        list with all OfferEtos that match the OfferFilter criteria

      • getFilteredProducts

        @GET
 @Path(value="/product/sortby/{sortBy}")
 @Deprecated
List<ProductEto> getFilteredProducts(ProductFilter productFilter,
                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="sortBy")
                                                                                                   ProductSortBy sortBy)
        Deprecated. 
        Delegates to Offermanagement.findProductsFiltered(io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.to.ProductFilter, io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.to.ProductSortBy).
        Parameters:
        productFilter - filter specification
        sortBy - sorting specification
        Returns:
        list with all ProductEtos that match the ProductFilter criteria

      • findOfferEtosByPost

        @Path(value="/offer/search")
 @POST
PaginatedListTo<OfferEto> findOfferEtosByPost(OfferSearchCriteriaTo searchCriteriaTo)
        Delegates to Offermanagement.findOfferEtos(io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.to.OfferSearchCriteriaTo).
        Parameters:
        searchCriteriaTo - the pagination and search criteria to be used for finding offers.
        Returns:
        the list of matching OfferEtos.

      • findProductEtosByPost

        @Path(value="/product/search")
 @POST
PaginatedListTo<ProductEto> findProductEtosByPost(ProductSearchCriteriaTo searchCriteriaTo)
        Delegates to Offermanagement.findProductEtos(io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api.to.ProductSearchCriteriaTo).
        Parameters:
        searchCriteriaTo - the pagination and search criteria to be used for finding products.
        Returns:
        the list of matching ProductEtos.
